problem_names:
lemma initial_arr_unique:
    assumes "par f f'" and "initial_arr f" and "initial_arr f'"
    shows "f = f'"

lemma initialI [intro]:
    assumes "ide a" and "\<And>b. ide b \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>!f. \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>"
    shows "initial a"

lemma initialE [elim]:
    assumes "initial a" and "ide b"
    obtains f where "\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>" and "\<And>f'. \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow> f' = f"

lemma terminal_arr_unique:
    assumes "par f f'" and "terminal_arr f" and "terminal_arr f'"
    shows "f = f'"

lemma terminalI [intro]:
    assumes "ide b" and "\<And>a. ide a \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>!f. \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>"
    shows "terminal b"

lemma terminalE [elim]:
    assumes "terminal b" and "ide a"
    obtains f where "\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>" and "\<And>f'. \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow> f' = f"

theorem terminal_objs_isomorphic:
    assumes "terminal a" and "terminal b"
    shows "isomorphic a b"

theorem initial_objs_isomorphic:
    assumes "initial a" and "initial b"
    shows "isomorphic a b"

lemma point_is_mono:
    assumes "point f"
    shows "mono f"
translations:
lemma initial_arr_unique:
    assumes "par f f'" and "initial_arr f" and "initial_arr f'"
    shows "f = f'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f = f'
using assms in_homI initial_def ide_cod

proof (prove)
using this:
  par f f'
  initial_arr f
  initial_arr f'
  \<lbrakk>arr ?f; local.dom ?f = ?a; cod ?f = ?b\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<guillemotleft>?f : ?a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>
  initial ?a \<equiv>
  ide ?a \<and>
  (\<forall>b.
      ide b \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : ?a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>))
  arr ?f \<Longrightarrow> ide (cod ?f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f = f'
by blast

lemma initialI [intro]:
    assumes "ide a" and "\<And>b. ide b \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>!f. \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>"
    shows "initial a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. initial a
using assms initial_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ide a
  ide ?b \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>!f. \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>
  initial ?a \<equiv>
  ide ?a \<and>
  (\<forall>b.
      ide b \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : ?a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. initial a
by auto

lemma initialE [elim]:
    assumes "initial a" and "ide b"
    obtains f where "\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>" and "\<And>f'. \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow> f' = f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>;
         \<And>f'.
            \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
            f' = f\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms initial_def initial_arr_unique

proof (prove)
using this:
  initial a
  ide b
  initial ?a \<equiv>
  ide ?a \<and>
  (\<forall>b.
      ide b \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : ?a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>))
  \<lbrakk>par ?f ?f'; initial_arr ?f; initial_arr ?f'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?f = ?f'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>;
         \<And>f'.
            \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
            f' = f\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by meson

lemma terminal_arr_unique:
    assumes "par f f'" and "terminal_arr f" and "terminal_arr f'"
    shows "f = f'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f = f'
using assms in_homI terminal_def ide_dom

proof (prove)
using this:
  par f f'
  terminal_arr f
  terminal_arr f'
  \<lbrakk>arr ?f; local.dom ?f = ?a; cod ?f = ?b\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<guillemotleft>?f : ?a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))
  arr ?f \<Longrightarrow> ide (local.dom ?f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f = f'
by blast

lemma terminalI [intro]:
    assumes "ide b" and "\<And>a. ide a \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>!f. \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>"
    shows "terminal b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. terminal b
using assms terminal_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ide b
  ide ?a \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>!f. \<guillemotleft>f : ?a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. terminal b
by auto

lemma terminalE [elim]:
    assumes "terminal b" and "ide a"
    obtains f where "\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>" and "\<And>f'. \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow> f' = f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>;
         \<And>f'.
            \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
            f' = f\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms terminal_def terminal_arr_unique

proof (prove)
using this:
  terminal b
  ide a
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))
  \<lbrakk>par ?f ?f'; terminal_arr ?f; terminal_arr ?f'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?f = ?f'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<lbrakk>\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>;
         \<And>f'.
            \<guillemotleft>f' : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
            f' = f\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by meson

theorem terminal_objs_isomorphic:
    assumes "terminal a" and "terminal b"
    shows "isomorphic a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  terminal a
  terminal b
obtain f where f: "\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  terminal a
  terminal b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using terminal_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  terminal a
  terminal b
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by meson

proof (state)
this:
  \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  terminal a
  terminal b
obtain g where g: "\<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  terminal a
  terminal b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>g.
        \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using terminal_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  terminal a
  terminal b
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>g.
        \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by meson

proof (state)
this:
  \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
have "iso f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.iso f
using assms f g

proof (prove)
using this:
  terminal a
  terminal b
  \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>
  \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.iso f

by (metis arr_iff_in_hom cod_comp retractionI sectionI seqI' terminal_def
            dom_comp in_homE iso_iff_section_and_retraction ide_in_hom)

proof (state)
this:
  local.iso f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  local.iso f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
using f

proof (prove)
using this:
  local.iso f
  \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  isomorphic a b

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

theorem initial_objs_isomorphic:

    shows "isomorphic a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  initial a
  initial b
obtain f where f: "\<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  initial a
  initial b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using initial_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  initial a
  initial b
  initial ?a \<equiv>
  ide ?a \<and>
  (\<forall>b.
      ide b \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>f.
        \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  initial a
  initial b
obtain g where g: "\<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  initial a
  initial b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>g.
        \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using initial_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  initial a
  initial b
  initial ?a \<equiv>
  ide ?a \<and>
  (\<forall>b.
      ide b \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : ?a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>g.
        \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
have "iso f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.iso f
using assms f g

proof (prove)
using this:
  initial a

  \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>
  \<guillemotleft>g : b \<rightarrow> a\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.iso f

by (metis (no_types, lifting) arr_iff_in_hom cod_comp in_homE initial_def
            retractionI sectionI dom_comp iso_iff_section_and_retraction ide_in_hom seqI')

proof (state)
this:
  local.iso f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  local.iso f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
using f

proof (prove)
using this:
  local.iso f
  \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> b\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. isomorphic a b
by auto

this:

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma point_is_mono:
    assumes "point f"
    shows "mono f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.mono f
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.mono f
have "ide (cod f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ide (cod f)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  point f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ide (cod f)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  ide (cod f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.mono f
from this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ide (cod f)
obtain t where t: "\<guillemotleft>t: cod f \<rightarrow> dom f\<guillemotright>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ide (cod f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<guillemotleft>t : cod f \<rightarrow> local.dom
           f\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms terminal_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ide (cod f)
  point f
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<guillemotleft>t : cod f \<rightarrow> local.dom
           f\<guillemotright> \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<guillemotleft>t : cod f \<rightarrow> local.dom f\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.mono f
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<guillemotleft>t : cod f \<rightarrow> local.dom f\<guillemotright>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.mono f
using assms terminal_def monoI

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<guillemotleft>t : cod f \<rightarrow> local.dom f\<guillemotright>
  point f
  terminal ?b \<equiv>
  ide ?b \<and>
  (\<forall>a.
      ide a \<longrightarrow>
      (\<exists>!f.
          \<guillemotleft>f : a \<rightarrow> ?b\<guillemotright>))
  \<lbrakk>arr ?g;
   \<And>f f'.
      seq ?g f \<and>
      seq ?g f' \<and> ?g \<cdot> f = ?g \<cdot> f' \<Longrightarrow>
      f = f'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> local.mono ?g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.mono f
by (metis seqE in_homI dom_comp ide_dom terminal_def)

proof (state)
this:
  local.mono f

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
end
